items.title: Analytics Dashboard Implementation
items.description: Develop an analytics dashboard to display key project metrics and performance indicators in real-time.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays at least 5 key project metrics (e.g., task completion rate, overdue tasks, resource utilization, budget usage, project progress).
Data updates on the dashboard occur in real-time or within a maximum delay of 5 minutes.
Users can filter metrics by project, team, and date range.
Dashboard is accessible from both desktop and mobile devices.
Charts and graphs are interactive and allow drill-down into detailed data.
dependencies: Project data collection and storage system
non_functional: Dashboard loads within 3 seconds for standard datasets
Supports at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation
Responsive design for multiple screen sizes

notes: Assumed that the analytics dashboard is a core feature of the project management tool and requires real-time data integration. Specific metrics and data sources were inferred due to lack of detail.
